title: Ambassadors discuss the decade for women
creator_contributor_role: Centre for Social Development and Humanitarian Affairs (United Nations), production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/United Nations
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Women's rights
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women's rights
description: Episode of Series "Women's Decade". Four heads of permanent missions to the United Nations discuss the issues of women's rights. 1976-1985 has been designated as the United Nations decade for women, and a female journalist interviews these four male ambassadors about aims for this decade.
